description: The image shows a robot with a door and a bottle. The door is located on the left side of the robot, and the bottle is located on the right side of the robot. The robot appears to be in a room with a marble wall.

objects.name: door
objects.location: The door is located in the center of the image. It is closed. There is a red line on the left side of the door.
objects.purpose: To enter or exit the room
objects.relationship: The door is the main entrance to the room

objects.name: bottle
objects.location: The bottle is located on the left side of the image. It is in front of a white wall. The bounding box is [96, 206, 149, 302].
objects.relationship: There is no relationship with other objects
